comment.author: 38896199@N06
comment._content: Great image, there is so much to look at in this, especially the Cliff Richard styled bloke to the left. That looks like one of those silver cross prams to the left also!

comment.author: 75116182@N04
comment._content: Nice photo! There are a lot of shoes. Is it a flea market?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/75116182@N04] Yes, I suppose it was what we would think of as a flea market...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 31301237@N00
comment._content: Minus the fashion, I think this photo could pass for being taken today.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/rizaaroni] Well I just found out today that this market is still going strong, and that second hand clothes, etc. are still very in evidence...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: I knew both gentlemen to see in the area, especially the elderly man sitting on the teachest.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Well, who's going to be the first to say it - Small World! Just to see? No names?

comment.author: 23885771@N03
comment._content: Remember it quite well. When the 'aul wans' got rummaging through the piles of old clothes lain out along the pavement, there was no stopping them - they became like wild animals in the hunt!

comment.author: 8840244@N04
comment._content: Wonderful characters! Wonderful scene! Seen in: Square in The City
